Articles.Content:
I have been seeing a few screenshots around of stunning clouds and sunrises - apparently these come from some mods.

Can anyone recommend some for me to use? There seem to be quite a multiplicity.

Hard to say with out seeing a picture but you might try this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115408-WIP-Scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-mod-%28v0-0151-20-05-2015%29

Or EVE http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements Or http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102145-0-25-Astronomer-s-Visual-Pack-Interstellar-V2 Or http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76972-0-90-KSPRC-Renaissance-Compilation-artworks-remake-V-0-2-%2818-04-15%29 Or http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83215-WIP-RSS-Visual-Enhancements-%28RVE%29

And I'll stop there good luck.
